    display: none; }

    display: block;

    transition: 250ms all ease-in-out; }

    color: #ffffff; }
.module-newsletter-subscribe .input-email::-webkit-input-placeholder, .module-newsletter-subscribe .input-email:-ms-input-placeholder, .module-newsletter-subscribe .input-email::placeholder {
    color: #ffffff; }
.module-newsletter-subscribe .input-email:focus, .module-newsletter-subscribe .input-email:hover {
